title.narrative: Vaccination of Goats and Sheep against Peste des petits ruminants and cattle against contagious Bovine Pleuro Pneumonia UGA-08/A14

description.narrative:
22 October 2008 Dear Theo, Thank you for sending us the request for reprogramming of funds for the CERF Rapid Response project for FAO (08-FAO-033) for Uganda. Given the explanation provided in the letter by FAO Representative, Mr. Percy Misika, I hereby approve the revisions requested for this project, in accordance with the new budget template you have sent us. I further wish you success in the completion of this project. With best regards, Steve
reprogramming approved on 23 October 2008

participating-org.narrative: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO)

owner-org.narrative: UN OCHA Central Emergency Response Fund (CERF)

organisation.narrative: UN Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (OCHA)

mailing-address.narrative: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (OCHA), Central Emergency Response Fund (CERF), 2 United Nations Plaza (DC2), East 44th street (13th floor), United Nations, New York, USA

description.narrative: Disbursement to CERF Project Vaccination of Goats and Sheep against Peste des petits ruminants and cattle against contagious Bovine Pleuro Pneumonia UGA-08/A14

receiver-org.narrative: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO)

condition.narrative: CERF funding is based on an agreed proposal, including specific planned outcomes and outputs.
